titles.title: A bill to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain line items in entries of tailored garments from Costa Rica.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/28/2009--Introduced. Directs U.S. Customs and Border Protection to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain line items in entries of tailored garments from Costa Rica.
